articles.content: Nintendo's Super Mario 35th anniversary celebration continues this weekend with a brand-new Splatfest event in Splatoon 2. The game's Mario-themed Splatfest is now underway, and it asks players to ch… [+1567 chars]

articles.author: David Tuffley
articles.title: Love in the time of algorithms: would you let your artificial intelligence choose your partner? - The Conversation AU
articles.description: Artificial intelligence is becoming increasingly common across aspects of our lives. But what role should it play in how we find love?
articles.content: It could be argued artificial intelligence (AI) is already the indispensable tool of the 21st century. From helping doctors diagnose and treat patients to rapidly advancing new drug discoveries, its … [+5791 chars]
